titles.title: Souten no Ken: Regenesis (2018)
Souten no Ken Re-Genesis (2018)
蒼天の拳 REGENESIS (2018)
Fist of the Blue Sky: Regenesis (2018)
蒼天之拳 REGENESIS

anime.description: Green Gang leader http://anidb.net/ch93365 [Han Gyokurei], West Dipper Lunar Fist user http://anidb.net/ch93363 [Yasaka], and http://anidb.net/ch93008 [Kasumi Kenshirou] are missing. http://anidb.net/ch94880 [Simeon] and Nahash leaders` plans for re-creation and development of a new world of Genesis is under way. Note: It was delivered on Amazon Prime Video Japan and Crunchyroll and other streaming services one week ahead of its TV broadcast.

episode.title: 神に選ばれし民
God`s Chosen People
Kami ni Erabareshi Tami
episode.summary: Leaving the war-torn China behind, Kasumi Kenshiro and his friends enjoy a moment`s respite in Jakarta, Indonesia. However, the Dutch army is closing in, and there are rumors in the city about vampires. The people are being kidnapped and experimented on. Meanwhile, a man tattooed with the same markings as Fei-Yan and wearing a cloak appears before Kenshiro. He suddenly chops at Kenshiro, attacking him. "If you`ve got a complaint about the North Star... complain to me!" Kenshiro`s final battle for his life begins now... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 第2期からでも百裂倍楽しめる! アニメ蒼天の拳REGENESIS 放送直前特番! ~上坂すみれ&小林ゆう 女子でもわかる! 副音声付き!~
Episode S1
Dai 2 Ki kara demo Hyakuretsubai Tanoshimeru! Anime Souten no Ken: Regenesis Housou Chokuzen Tokuban! Uesaki Sumire & Kobayashi Yuu - Joshi demo Wakaru! Fukuonsei Tsuki!
義兄への憧れ
Admiration for a Brother
Ani e no Akogare
episode.summary: Hidden beneath the cloak is Pole Cross Sacred Fist user Liu Fei-He, a woman martial artist who loved Liu Fei-Yan like a brother. When she learned of Fei-Yan`s death, avenging him became her purpose in life. Meanwhile, as Yasaka and Erika are eating with the orphans, a mysterious group appears. Loud classical music suddenly begins playing. When kenshiro arrives, he takes on the man who materializes out of the darkness: the Dutch army`s Captain Kolk. "I shall create the ultimate human weapon!" Enraged by the way Kolk drives men mad, Kenshiro`s fists explode with fury. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 現実になった予言
The Prophecy That Came True
Genjitsu ni Natta Yogen
episode.summary: Kolk has created human weapons. Kolk plunges his glowing fingers into his own body and modifies himself before striking at Kenshiro. "We seek to re-create the world!" What are the thunderbolts of Migadol and re-creation Kolk mentioned in his final moments...?! Meanwhile, Simeon Nagid appears before Erika. Yasaka tries to protect her, but he and Erika are kidnapped. And waiting for Erika was a shocking truth and Simeon`s horrifying plan... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ミガドルの雷
Migadol`s Thunderbolts
Migadol no Kaminari
episode.summary: "The Divine Fist of the North Star saves people. You should forget about revenge." When Yu-Ling tells Fei-He Fei-Yan`s last words, she doesn`t know what to do with herself. Meanwhile, Kenshiro is doing his best to find Erika and Yasaka. Erika has been taken to an underground palace, where`s she told the truth about "Migadol`s Thunderbolts" by the leaders of Genesis. What are the Thunderbolts of Migadol that are in her memories, and who was her father, the genius scholar Robert Arendt...?! In order to save Yasaka`s life, Erika eventually makes her decision. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 交わらぬ想い
Thoughts That Never Cross
Majiwaranu Omoi
episode.summary: A badly wounded Yasaka is chained up inside the torture chamber. In order to protect Erika, he breaks free from his chains and uses his ultimate techinque against Heaven Dipper Sacred Yin Fist user Simeon. Their bloody battle is interrupted by Erika when she is enveloped by a blinding light and majestically speaks on Migadol`s Thunderbolts. Suddenly, the roof of Genesis` subterranean palace collapses, and Kasumi Kenshiro appears. "You smell even worse now." Kenshiro`s eyes are glittering with rage!! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ナハシュの落日
The Setting Sun of the Nahash People
Nahash no Rakujitsu
episode.summary: Simeon and Kenshiro face off in Erika`s presence. The battle between the Divine Fist of the North Star and Heaven Dipper Sacred Yin fist has finally begun. Taking advantage of the chaos, Himuka leads Erika through the hallways of the underground palace. He demands to know the location of the jewels. What is Himuka`s true goal...?! Simeon and Kenshiro engage in a fierce battle. As they exchange blows, Kenshiro realizes Simeon`s true nature and utters a requiem for him. "Your style hasn`t made any progress since long ago, like a snake that can`t shed its skin..." Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 散り逝く漢
Men Who Scatter and Die
Chiriyuku Otoko
episode.summary: Genesis` palace begins to fall apart as the self-destruct sequence is initiated. Loud rumbling noises sound througout the palace, and columns and walls begin to collapse. Yasaka is crushed under falling debris while trying to protect Erika and Fei-He, and he is swallowed by the flames... Meanwhile, in the research lab located in the deepest parts of the palace, Simeon learns what Himuka has been hiding underneath his mask. "Himuka, huh? I don`t need that name anymore." With one piercing blue eye and one of brilliant gold, Himuka had been deceiving and using Simeon. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 霞拳心の道
The Path of Kasumi Kenshin
Kasumi Kenshin no Michi
episode.summary: The sound of bells rings out across Mt. Koya. One man passes beneath the gates of the North Star Temple. The man who appears before Kasumi Kenshiro`s father Tesshin is Kasumi Kenshin, who has abandoned the name Himuka. Kenshin was saved by Tesshin after he fell off a cliff and then trained under him. As Tesshin and Kenshin face off, Kenshin describes the world he once experienced and the great hope, the re-creation of a new world, that was born from it. "You`ve fallen, Kenshin." Tesshin`s body exudes fighting spirit. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死合う運命[さだめ]
Destined to Die Together
Shi Au Sadame
episode.summary: The blue Death Omen Star glows at the edge of the Big Dipper. Gazing up at the night sky, Erika beleives Fei-Yan and Yasaka are watching over her from up there. Just then, an injured Ramon arrives at Kenshiro`s mansion, bringing the jewels with him. Their father Tesshin has been killed by Kenshin. Upon hearing of his father`s final moments, Kenshiro reminisces about Kenshin. Since he was a boy, Kenshin is what Kenshiro had to fear most. Kenshin appears before Kenshiro once again. Compelled by the destiny of the North Star, Kenshiro and Kenshin begin the fight for their lives now!! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 受け継ぐ生き様
Life of the Successor
Uketsugu Ikizama
episode.summary: "I will end this rotten world! I will cause a regenesis!" Kenshin describes the selfishness and foolishness he witnessed while wandering the world as truths to Kenshiro. Unable to watch Kenshiro on the defensive against Kenshin any longer, Erika steels her resolve and approaches Kenshin. They disappear together in a gust of wind. Since his pressure point was struck in his battle against Kenshin, the light of Kenshiro`s life is fading. To prepare for his final battle against Kenshin, Kenshiro has Ramon strike a pressure point that will extend his life. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ひとりの少女 エリカ・アレント
Erika Arendt, the Lone Girl
Hitori no Shoujo Erika Arendt
episode.summary: Seated in the throne of the ruins of Nohal Naha, Erika`s memories are awakened by the jewels. The plans for the nuclear fission device are projected and slowly drawn onto the parchment Kenshin gazes down upon... Hearing Erika`s heart-rending request to end her life, Kenshiro gently touches a pressure point on Erika`s forehead. A single tear falls from Kenshiro`s eyes. "I`ll protect the smile of the girl I see in front of me. That`s a plenty good reason to fight." His final battle as the 62nd successor to the Divine Fist of the North Star has finally begun. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 霞拳志郎と云う漢
The Man Named Kasumi Kenshiro
Kasumi Kenshirou to Iu Otoko
episode.summary: Kenshin`s combined Heaven Dipper Sacred Yin Fist and Divine Fist of the North Star ultimate technique swallows up Kenshiro. "This is the final blow... My history begins now!!" "Then I`ll place the wishes of my pengyou in this blow...!!" When two evenly-matched powerhouses battle one another, the Death Omen Star shines above both their heads. Destined by the North Star to kill one another, how will Kenshiro and Kenshin`s battle end--?! Kenshiro`s final battle is coming to a close!! Source: crunchyroll
